channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Language conceals and reveals

item.title: Redefining a profession

item.title: WWE Bash In Berlin: Date, Time, Card And How To Watch
item.description: On Saturday, August 31 in Berlin, WWE Bash in Berlin will emanate from Uber Arena with a five-match card. Here's how you can watch.

item.title: Write for someone
item.description: It’s so tempting to write for everyone. But everyone isn’t going to read your work, someone is. Can you tell me who? Precisely? What did they believe ...

item.title: Technology as The Wild Card of Sustainability
item.description: We should embrace technology with a good measure of courage and humility. It's a “wild card” which we can play to our advantage or to our loss.
